summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1833, for the improvement of East John Street, from Thirty-sixth Avenue North to Thirty-seventh Avenue North; Thirty-sixth Avenue North, from East Thomas Street to the south line of Coulter's Addition to the City of Seattle, and Thirty-seventh Avenue North, from High Lane to the south line of Coulter's Addition to the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, and that portion of Thirty-seventh Avenue North between East John Street and the south line of Coulter's Addition, by grading and curbing and constructing concrete walks, under Ordinance No. 19025, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
